1.title: Gentleman AF
1.subtitle: Gentleman AF is a beard care line featuring a beard wash, beard oils, and beard balms for classy men with a dash of savagery.

products.name: Beard Balms
products.description: Scoop a dime sized amount of beard balm with your finger and place it in the palm of your hands. Rub it between both palms until it melts. Apply it to your beard, comb it down and style as desired.

products.name: Beard Wash
products.description: Wet your face and neck, place a small amount of beard wash in the palm of your hands and massage it into your beard and face, including your neck. Rinse your beard thoroughly.

products.name: Beard Oils
products.description: Shake well before use. Drop a dime sized amount of beard oil in the palm of your hands. Rub your hands and apply the oil from your skin to the tip of your beard.

9.title: How students of color confront impostor syndrome
9.subtitle: As a black woman from a tough part of the Bronx who grew up to attain all the markers of academic prestige, Dena Simmons knows that for students of color, success in school sometimes comes at the cost of living authentically. Now an educator herself, Simmons discusses how we might create a classroom that makes all students feel proud of who they are.

19.title: Juneteenth is a federal holiday. What comes next?
19.subtitle: As President Biden signed the Juneteenth National Independence Day Act into law, he acknowledged a current struggle for voting rights.

19.title: What Is Juneteenth?
19.subtitle: Juneteenth (short for June Nineteenth) marks the day when federal troops arrived in Galveston, Texas in 1865 to take control of the state and ensure that all enslaved people be freed. The troops arrival came a full two and a half years after the signing of the Emancipation Proclamation. Juneteenth honors the end to slavery in the United States and is considered the longest-running African American holiday.

19.title: Juneteenth Challenges A Narrative About Americas History
19.subtitle: Juneteenth marks the day in 1865 when Union troops arrived in Galveston, Texas, and the enslaved people living there learned of their freedom  more than two years after President Abraham Lincoln issued the Emancipation Proclamation. As such, the day tells a broader story of how emancipation was woefully delayed for Black people enslaved deep in the Confederacy.

21.title: Alaffia
21.subtitle:
Alaffia is an online Fair Trading company that specializes in soaps and beauty products. We aim to alleviate poverty and advance gender equality through the Fair Trade of indegenious resources and community empowerment projects.

Together, we’re cultivating beauty, equality and empowerment in West Africa and around the globe. Our women’s cooperatives in West Africa handcraft indigenous raw ingredients then the Alaffia team in Olympia, Washington creates the finished products. Alaffia returns the proceeds from the sale of these products to our communities to fund community empowerment and gender equality projects.

We are foodies, artists, activists, community folk, and innovators who love, love, love what we do.

24.subtitle: The King Center remain committed to proactively educating and training individuals and leaders across all sectors in Nonviolence365 to influence equitable change in our national and global infrastructure.

25.title: Adwoa Beauty
25.subtitle: Adwoa beauty is a modern, non toxic, gender neutral beauty brand catering to multi-cultural hair textures. Buying hair products is a choice, not a command. We empathize with your experience in using tons of products that failed to deliver the results. We've created a highly effective collection of products with ingredients that are concentrated, working with nature and science to bring you immediate results. We are committed to being transparent with our ingredients.

products.name: baomint moisturizing curl defining cream
products.description: it’s your lucky day! our baomint moisturizing curl defining cream will be your new favorite styler. imagine a thick + creamy + rich cream that will leave your strands shiny, silky, and smooth just the way you like it.

products.name: baomint protect + shine oil blend
products.description: this eclectic mix of 15+ natural oils work together in balanced proportions to aid growth and add shine + strength to your hair. we’ve selected high-quality oils for absorption into the hair strands to penetrate from the inside out

products.name: be kinky sweatshirt
products.description: our very soft "be kinky" sweatshirt is a classic with our logo on the back.

25.title: Automotive Heroes of Black History Month
25.subtitle: Ever wonder what driving would be like without turn signals or traffic lights? Well, without these great inventors, engineers, scientists, and pioneers of their field, driving wouldn’t be what it is today! In celebration of Black History Month, we want to share a few of their exciting stories with you.

26.title: Racially Targeted Arrests in the Era of Marijuana Reform
26.subtitle: For decades, marijuana laws have been used to criminalize Black and Brown people, waste taxpayer money, and fuel the mass incarceration crisis. However, states across the country are taking strides toward reforming these outdated and harmful policies.

26.title: Very Puzzled
26.subtitle: As a parent it can be quite challenging to find items such as books and toys that are representative of the diverse society that we live in.  It is important that children see other people that look different to themselves in the books and toys that they interact with to ensure that they appreciate their own heritage and respect the heritage and culture of others.

products.name: 100 piece Africa Map Giant Jigsaw Puzzle
products.description: Puzzles are really great way for you and your extended family to bond with a child.  The very puzzled Africa Map Puzzle is definitely something that you can get stuck into that is rewarding with 100 pieces and each country on the continent of Africa is represented with a variety of landmarks, monuments and attractions it will provide endless fun and topics of discussion that can be used as fun way to learn for both children and adults.

products.name: Ethiopia colour-in t-shirt
products.description: The Ethiopia colour-in t-shirt makes perfect gift for any child with a creative edge or a group activity for parties or play dates.⁠

products.name: Ghana Map Poster
products.description: The Very Puzzled Ghana map poster is an A2 poster that accurately reflects the map of Ghana each region of Ghana is represented with a variety of landmarks, monuments and attractions it will provide endless fun and topics of discussion that can be used as fun way to learn for both children and adults.

27.title: So you want to talk about race
27.subtitle: Ijeoma Oluo guides readers of all races through subjects ranging from intersectionality and affirmative action to "model minorities" in an attempt to make the seemingly impossible possible: honest conversations about race and racism, and how they infect almost every aspect of American life.

27.title: Sade Baron
27.subtitle: Sade and Rachel are a mother-daughter duo creating high-performance body care products that make your skin feel great. As a 100% woman-owned business, they select every ingredient in their products. Everything is handmade, carefully packaged, and personally checked for impeccable quality.

products.name: Body Care Set 1 - Normal Skin
products.description: The essentials kit features everything you need to keep maintain your skin health. Start with a new skinfood routine and feed it nutrient-rich superfoods all day, every day.

products.name: Go Clean Starter Kit | Body Care Set
products.description: With this Go Clean Body Care Starter Set you can finally remove excessive ingredients and chemicals from your daily body care routine. With Sade Baron, all of our products are 100% vegan, made with clean ingredients to work for most skin types, so you can trust that you'll find great products to work for you.

products.name: Fragrance Free Body Wash
products.description: A light face and body wash suitable for everyday use. This fragrance-free body wash is perfect for babies, children and adults with reactive and sensitive skin. With superfats galore like avocado oil, olive oil and more, this liquid castile soap will leave your skin hydrated day after day.

28.title: Natural Cuties
28.subtitle: Natural Cuties is a brand that promotes, encourages and highlights the beauty of African American hair in its natural state! #Iamanaturalcutie are you?

products.name: I am a Natural Cutie Book
products.description: Phoenix is excited about rocking her big afro puffs on the first day of Kindergarten. After hearing the other girls make fun of her puffs she is ready to go home. She will soon learn just what it means to be a NATURAL Cutie!

products.name: Drawstring Bag
products.description: Combine your love for vibrant prints and a sporty style with a cool drawstring bag. It’s a must-have gym essential that can be worn as a backpack with drawstring closure at top, and narrow, contrasting shoulder straps.

products.name: Mug
products.description: Whether you’re drinking your morning coffee, your evening tea, or something in between – this mug’s for you! It’s sturdy and glossy with a vivid print that’ll withstand the microwave and dishwasher.

28.title: Dr. Ernest Everett Just
28.subtitle: Dr. Ernest Just was a pioneering African American biologist, academic and science writer. Just's primary legacy is his recognition of the fundamental role of the cell surface in the development of organisms.

29.title: Taste by Dannie K
29.subtitle: Taste by Dannie K is a black-owned lingerie company dedicated to the empowerment of women of all shades and sizes. It is our mission to help women realize that they are powerful beyond measure & that they don't have to tone down their super power of sexy to be taken seriously.

29.title: Amazing Essence
29.subtitle: Amazing Essence is a Philadelphia based, one-woman small business built on a dream of entrepreneurship. Our handcrafted products are created using 100% soy wax without additives, natural (lead-free) cotton wick and high quality fragrance oils without phthalates or additives.

products.name: 25 oz. Triple Wick Candle Bowl
products.description: The Amazing Essence 25 oz. candle bowls are handcrafted using natural soy wax, high quality fragrance oils without phthalates and a natural cotton wick to ensure a clean, toxic-free burn in your home or office.

products.name: 4oz. Linen Spray
products.description: Mist our handcrafted linen sprays into the air liberally to Relax, Balance or Uplift your senses. When misting Linen, Spray 7 inches away and only on washable fabric. Contains essential oils/highly quality fragrance oils.

products.name: 8oz. Herbal Candles
products.description: The Amazing Essence 8 oz. herbal candles are handcrafted using natural soy wax, and fused with dried herbs, high quality fragrance oils without phthalates and a natural cotton wick to ensure a clean, toxic-free burn in your home or office. Approx 40hr of burn time.

30.title: The symbols of systemic racism — and how to take away their power
30.subtitle: Multidisciplinary artist and TED Fellow Paul Rucker is unstitching the legacy of systemic racism in the United States. A collector of artifacts connected to the history of slavery — from branding irons and shackles to postcards depicting lynchings — Rucker couldn't find an undamaged Ku Klux Klan robe for his collection, so he began making his own.

30.title: Land Acknowledgement App
30.subtitle: Text the name of a city and state to 855-917-5263 to find out the Indigenous people of that place.
